name: Kingdom Inc.
description:
A simple roguelike city-builder about working around the poor planning skills of a meddlesome robot.

Controls:
WASD - Move camera
Scroll wheel - Zoom in/out
Click - Place a building
Escape - Restart
Hover over buildings for more info

Made in 3 and a bit days for the Wowie 4.0 jam!

Music is Three Red Hearts - Modern Bits by Abstraction
Grid texture from the Polygon Prototype pack by Synty Studios
